video.title: Adaalat
video.synopsis: Defense attorney KD Pathak is nearly unbeatable in the courtroom, but the sophisticated, unconventional lawyer ultimately places justice first.

episodes.synopsis: The prime minister asks KD to take the case of a maid accused of sacrificing her husband during a black magic ritual.
episodes.title: Rahasya Kale Jadu Ka

episodes.synopsis: A jungle-dwelling "wild man" named Chikara is accused of killing a girl who was walking through the wilderness with her boyfriend.
episodes.title: Jungli Maanav

episodes.synopsis: When four people are shot to death in an office conference room, the accused killer claims that she was unconscious during the incident.
episodes.title: Murda Qatil

episodes.synopsis: After dreaming that three of his friends have been killed, Sanjay awakens to find that the nightmare has come true, and he's charged with the crime.
episodes.title: Khooni Khwab

episodes.synopsis: A loud noise kills a famous playback singer, Kabir Ali, and the film's music director is under suspicion, but KD believes someone else is responsible.
episodes.title: Maut Ki Awaaz

episodes.synopsis: KD tries to uncover the truth when Hariya dies in court after asking his wealthy brother, a diamond broker, for money for his daughter's wedding.
episodes.title: KD in Dock

episodes.synopsis: Dhruv Dixit is arrested when investigators find a frozen dead body in his house, though he has no idea how it got there. Can KD uncover the truth?
episodes.title: Barfili Laash

episodes.synopsis: A scientist researching a carnivorous tree leaves his reluctant assistant to run some tests while he's away, with some surprising results.
episodes.title: Adamkhor Ped

episodes.synopsis: KD tries to uncover the truth when a girl claims that her mother was possessed by ghosts when she killed her father in a reputedly haunted bungalow.
episodes.title: Bhootiya Banglo

episodes.synopsis: When a clown is accused of killing two people during a birthday party, KD turns to a video recording of the celebration to track down the real killer.
episodes.title: Mayus Joker

episodes.synopsis: Sanjit Suri sues the hospital for negligence when his father dies, but KD must determine whether the man's doctor or nurse was responsible.
episodes.title: Dengue Se Rahasyamayi Maut

episodes.synopsis: KD takes the case of Suraj when his wife Soniya's dead body is found in his car and even Soniya's mother believes he's innocent.
episodes.title: Chalti Gaadi Mein Khoon

episodes.synopsis: KD takes the case of Justice Sharma when a 22-year-old woman's body is found in the respected jurist's bedroom.
episodes.title: Judge on Dock

episodes.synopsis: Ravi is visited by the spirit of his grandfather, Dinanath Tiwari, who reveals that he was murdered by someone in the family.
episodes.title: Adaalat Mein Bhoot

episodes.synopsis: Ritesh stages his own kidnapping with the aid of his friends, but things take an unexpected turn when Ritesh is murdered and no one knows who did it.
episodes.title: Gawaha Jasoos

episodes.synopsis: KD tries to prove that his new client, a little person, may have tried to rob a warehouse but didn't kill the owner.
episodes.title: Bauna Qatil

episodes.synopsis: KD considers intentionally losing a case in hopes of exposing a terrorist who planted a bomb on a bus filled with schoolchildren.
episodes.title: Aatankiyo Ki Sazish

episodes.synopsis: After mugging a man in the street, a petty thief stumbles upon the body of a murdered politician and finds himself accused of the crime.
episodes.title: Neta Ki Hatya

episodes.synopsis: When Radha, a circus performer known for her fire-related stunts, is killed in an explosion, evidence points to Sikandar, an admirer.
episodes.title: Maut Ka Khel

episodes.synopsis: When Shalini's physically and emotionally abusive husband Hemang is found murdered, she refuses to speak. But KD doesn't believe she's the killer.
episodes.title: Patni Ka Badla

episodes.synopsis: When respected journalist Ratna Rai is found murdered on a railroad track, KD defends her rival as evidence of her guilt begins to stack up.
episodes.title: Hit by Train

episodes.synopsis: When a well-known priest is accused of murdering two women, KD believes that there's more to the case than meets the eye.
episodes.title: Jaal Tantra Mantra Ka

episodes.synopsis: Five people die under mysterious circumstances during an occult ritual, and all evidence points to their spiritual leader as the suspect.
episodes.title: Jadui Maut: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Believing that there's more to the story, KD strives to uncover the cause of the five magic practitioners' deaths and identify the real killer.
episodes.title: Jadui Maut: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: KD takes the case of Satpal Singh, a driver who lapses into a coma after allegedly kidnapping a 2-year-old girl named Aanya.
episodes.title: Client in Coma: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: KD attempts to find 2-year-old kidnapping victim Aanya while preparing to defend comatose accused kidnapper Satpal Singh.
episodes.title: Client in Coma: Part 2
